api_list.name: Create index from sitemap
api_list.description:
Index's each page in the passed in sitemap.  
The sitemap parameter should be a URL to a valid XML sitemap.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Searches for occurrences of the search string in the index.  Results of any hits are returned,  sorted by score.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com/search/4762b038-d364-4c8f-ba49-c06ea21f79b8/5/broadgun"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com/search/{indexid}/{limit}/{searchstring}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete user
api_list.description: Deletes all indexes created by the user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com/delete-user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Remove Index
api_list.description: Removes an index that was previously created by /create-index.

api_list.name: Status
api_list.description: Retrieves all the index id's and the number of pages in each index.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadgun-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
